column4: can someone tellme how to install emacs or any other php editor?
um, I don't show that package, did you copy the name wrong?
could you post your /etc/apt/sources file on paste.ubuntu-nl.org ?
how do i paste it there?
open http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org , then in a terminal, type gksudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list Cut and paste to the pastebin
i put it on that site
remove lines 39, 41, & 43 ; uncomment (remove the #) from lines 19 & 20 , then add multiverse to the ends of lines 19 & 20
how can i tell which lines r which
the page you posted on paste.ubuntu-nl.org has the line numbers
I pasted the changes you should make; http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/10352
now it says E: Could not get lock /var/lib/dpkg/lock - open (11 Resource temporarily unavail able)
there's a couple other things, might take a bit.
i can see your pm, can you see mine?
